attributes.action: Support local planning authorites when they refuse planning permission for windfarms because the local community are against it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, if a developer applies for planning permission to develop a windfarm and the local community are against it and the local authority refuse planning permission, the developers can appeal against the decision. Central government have overuled the local authority and communities wishes. they are not listening to the local community who will have to live with the windfarm - They are supporting the developers. Windfarms are not an economical way to produce electricity and a number of other european states are now removing them or removing the subsidies to build them - will this government listen to what the local people want. Support the local residents, not the developers.
